head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths O'CONNELL, JOHN JOSEPH

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths O'CONNELL, JOHN JOSEPH

block.p: O'CONNELL-John Joseph (JJ), died April 26, 2000, in Sosua, The Dominican Republic. Former trial lawyer with Cravath Swaine and Moore and Executive Vice President, Industrial Relations of the Bethleham Steel Corporation. Beloved husband of the late Patricia O'Connell and loving father of Ryan, Matthew, Micaela, Carey, Colin and Timothy. A memorial service will be held on Saturday, June 3, at 11AM at Most Holy Trinity Church, 79 Buell Lane, East Hampton, NY. Donations may be made to the University of Virginia Law School Foundation, 580 Massie Road, Charlottesville VA 22903-1789 and to Most Holy Trinity Church, 79 Buell Lane, East Hampton NY 11937.
